text: Hi! I am new here and working on my first custom coded template. I'm having a hard time trying to apply a CSS file to my template. So I've added a file layout.css in the css folder in the root folder of the theme. Trying to add it in my template like this: `{% set template_css = "../css/layout.css" %}` but it didn't work. Any help would be so appreciated :pray:
Is your template within the theme?

Yes, it's in a custom theme I'm creating - I'm doing it for a practical exercise from HubSpot and the instructions said not to use the boilerplate theme but to create it from scratch and figure out how it's done in the boilerplate - no luck on my side though... :slightly_smiling_face:
oh gotcha.. add the layout.css file to base.html .. can you share your theme struture?

Oh wow, thank you! I will try it.
My theme structure is looking like this so far, I  will add base.html
This isn't the place for this, please post in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> also please don't spam every channel
